name: Tamakushi Casket
title: Sangonomiya Kokomi: Tamakushi Casket
desc: Wisdom yet revealed from the casket parallels tides yet unfolded by the sea.
in_play_description: When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses Nereid's Ascension: Summon a Bake-Kurage with a Usage(s) of 1; if Bake-Kurage is already on the field, then increase its Usage(s) by 1 instead. While Ceremonial Garment exists, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Sangonomiya Kokomi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Sangonomiya Kokomi, equip this card. After Sangonomiya Kokomi equips this card, immediately use Nereid's Ascension once. When your Sangonomiya Kokomi, who has this card equipped, uses Nereid's Ascension: Summon a Bake-Kurage with a Usage(s) of 1; if Bake-Kurage is already on the field, then increase its Usage(s) by 1 instead. While Ceremonial Garment exists, Bake-Kurage deals +1 DMG. (You must have Sangonomiya Kokomi in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
